data.title: 以 1 到 3 分钟谈论以下主题
data.content: What is the most unusual food that you have ever eaten? Who were you with, and how was the experience? What did you learn about yourself from eating this unusual food?
data.answer: One evening, I was having dinner with my parents at home. My mother cooked a lobster for us in two different ways. It is very unusual for me because I have never seen her cooking this way and I have never eaten a lobster like this before. It was made into sashimi, and cooked with noodles and creamy sauce. I loved the experience especially when its a dinner with my family. What I have learned from this experience is that we should always give the best to our family and look after one another. Making unusual food for your family is a good way to express the love and improve the relationship between each member of the family.（118 字）
